item.title: UBS upgrades this residential real estate broker, calls for nearly 50% upside ahead
item.description: UBS analyst Chris Kuntarich pointed to Compass' recently closed acquisition as a major catalyst for the stock.

item.title: KeyBanc upgrades Steel Dynamics, citing Trump’s steel tariffs as a catalyst
item.description: Analyst Philip Gibbs upgraded shares of the steel producer to overweight from sector weight.

item.title: Sell McDonald's on Monday's gains, Main Street Research investor says
item.description: Main Street Research's James Demmert says to sell McDonald's and Charles Schwab. The investor is bullish on German software stock SAP.

item.title: Steel and aluminum stocks surge on Trump plan to impose 25% tariffs on imports to U.S.
item.description: The aluminum tariff would add nearly 30 cents per pound to prices not including transportation and other costs, according to JPMorgan.

item.title: JPMorgan manager says his $39 billion ETF can profit from volatility in 2025 — and it yields 7%
item.description: Morningstar calls this a 'hot corner' of the ETF market.
